name: 3dDTeig
author: AFNI Developers
description: Computes eigenvalues and eigenvectors for an input dataset of tensors

inputs.description: Input dataset of Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz sub-bricks
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: Use the given prefix for the output dataset
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Coerce the output data to be stored as the given type (byte, short, or float).
inputs.name: Output Data Type

inputs.description: Save eigenvalues, vectors, FA, and MD in separate datasets
inputs.name: Separate Datasets Flag

inputs.description: Tensor data is stored as upper diagonal instead of lower diagonal
inputs.name: Upper Diagonal Data Flag

output-files.description: Output dataset with computed eigenvalues, eigenvectors, FA, and MD
output-files.name: Output Dataset
